meanings.definition: Fond of study; given to diligent application and pursuit of knowledge.
meanings.sent1: She is a studious student who always completes her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The studious boy spent hours reading books in the library.
meanings.sent3: The studious squirrel carefully collected acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a studious sponge, absorbing every detail of the lecture.
meanings.sent5: The studious glow in her eyes revealed her passion for learning.

meanings.definition: Given to diligent study; earnest in application to learning.
meanings.sent1: The studious researcher spent months analyzing the data.
meanings.sent2: He had a studious nature, always seeking to expand his knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The studious cat meticulously groomed its fur every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her studious dedication to her craft made her a master pianist.
meanings.sent5: The studious atmosphere in the classroom encouraged active participation.
